To divide the cake equally using this method, you can follow these steps:

  1. Cut the cake into two equal halves.
  2. Have one person choose which half they want.
  3. Cut the remaining half into two equal pieces.
  4. Have the other person choose which piece they want.
  5. Repeat this process until each person has received a piece of the cake.

This way, each person gets to choose which piece of the cake they want, and the pieces are equally sized, so no one can complain about getting a smaller or larger piece than anyone else.
